array.name: e
array.item: May Allah bless you in this holy month of Ramadan
I wish you a peaceful and happy Ramadan
I wish you health and prosperity in this Ramadan
Wishing you a joyful and glorious holy month
May this holy month bring an abundance of blessings
May Ramadan bring you ever closer to Jannah
Keeping you in our prayers during Ramadan
Sending your family love and light this Ramadan
May Allah be with you throughout your fast.
May Allah bless you during the Holy Month.
Allah bless and protect your family during Ramadan
May Allah be generous to you this Ramadan
Wishing you a holy month of enlightenment and joy.
Let Allah fill your life this holy month
May your fast bring you inner peace and inherent joy.
